intro: Ribesiodes viridiflorum, commonly known as the green-flowered ribes, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Geraniaceae. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and distinctive greenish-white flowers that bloom in late spring. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens for its unique floral display.
